ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes or concepts that identify a patient as a an occasional or non-daily tobacco smoker.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed for "Frequency of Tobacco Use" as an attribute of result. The intent of this data element is to identify patients as occasional tobacco smokers.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying occasional/some day users of smoking forms of tobacco.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
